short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and secure password generator that creates strong passwords to help keep your accounts safe.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
jjjjjj Password Generator is a powerful and easy-to-use password generator for Google Chrome that helps you create strong and unique passwords for all your online accounts. With customizable options such as including lowercase and uppercase letters, numbers, and special characters, you can easily generate passwords that meet the specific requirements of any website. The extension also allows you to save your settings and the last generated password, making it easy to quickly generate new passwords when you need them. 

Protect your online accounts with jjjjjj's Password Generator and never worry about weak passwords again.

*Highly recommended to use a password manager to store your passwords.
